name: Misfire (itch) (datoneguy246)
description:
You are stuck in an abandoned lab, you have to escape!

You have a prototype laser gun that can help you along the way...

...but it misfires often... if not all the time...

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys to move

Mouse to aim

LShift to slow down time

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020
